body:
I'd like to thank each and every one of the people who subbed to me from Avicus for making it this far for me :D. Even if it is only 100 it still means the world to me :). Here is my 100 Sub Special! Hope you enjoy and give it a thumbs up if you do!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OdCQKD8-ZCY&feature=youtu.be

Thank you guys <3

title: 100 Subscriber Special! :D
